Sentencas: To improve the efficiency of the energy conversion, a novel coupling model comprising a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), a thermoradiative cell (TRC) with sub-bandgap and non-radiative losses, and a regenerator is proposed.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The waste heat from the SOFC is utilized by the TRC to produce extra power.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Considering the main irreversible losses inside the coupling model, mathematical expressions for power and efficiency are derived, along with revealing the performance characteristics.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Numerical calculation results illustrate that the maximum power output density (MPOD) and corresponding efficiency of the coupled model are 0.94 Wm(-2) and 41%, respectively, which are improved by 68% and 14%, respectively, compared to a single SOFC.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the influences of parameters such as non-radiative losses, temperature, and bandgap are investigated.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The optimal operating regions for power output density, efficiency, and current are determined.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Finally, compared with the MPODs of the SOFC-based coupled models, the SOFC-TRC can more effectively utilize the waste heat released from the SOFC.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This study may provide some new ideas for the waste heat utilization of SOFC.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a thermoradiative device coupled to a solid oxide fuel cell
